name: Ihor Nikolenko
bio:
CEO/CMO/CRO & Digital Strategist. 
Start in 2008 at professional digital, I’ve been crafting digital solutions that drive business success and revenue growth. Marketing Leading a full-cycle digital agency, I develop innovative software and implement best practices for exceptional customer experiences. Passionate about empowering entrepreneurs, I provide education to navigate the digital world confidently. Let’s turn your vision into reality and achieve your ambitious business goals together!
